## R Markdown

Simulate a randomized clinical trial

```{r}
sim_data <- sim_data_EDSS(tx_alloc_FUN = treatment_alloc_randomized)

plot_distribution_edss(sim_data)
```

Simulate a dataset with unequal treatment allocation

```{r}
sim_data <- sim_data_EDSS(tx_alloc_FUN = treatment_alloc_confounding)

plot_distribution_edss(sim_data)
```
